name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Java AWS Cloud Engineer
professional_summary: Highly motivated Java AWS Cloud Engineer with 6+ years of software development experience, delivering sophisticated architectural builds and technology initiatives.
Proven track record of staying on top of the newest technology trends, with a passion for innovation and collaboration.
Expertise in agile development environments, ensuring efficient and effective project delivery.
Strong communication and organization skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team.
Developed and deployed scalable cloud-based applications on AWS, utilizing Java and other relevant technologies.
Utilized continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to ensure efficient and automated application deployment.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy cloud-based solutions.
Designed and implemented high-availability and high-security architecture for cloud-based applications.
Utilized AWS services such as S3, Lambda, and API Gateway to build scalable and secure applications.
Developed and maintained cloud-based infrastructure, including AWS EC2, RDS, and Elastic Beanstalk.
Ensured compliance with security and regulatory requirements, such as HIPAA and PCI-DSS.
Collaborated with QA teams to design and execute test plans for cloud-based applications.
Developed and deployed DevOps pipelines using tools such as Jenkins and Docker.
Utilized containerization technologies such as Docker to build and deploy cloud-based applications.
Collaborated with cloud architects to design and implement cloud-based solutions.
Developed and maintained cloud-based services, including AWS Lambda and API Gateway.
